fullplot: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo, all the while deconstructing the conventions and archetypes of the horror genre for them.
plot: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo, all the while ...
title: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon

tomatoes.consensus: A smart mockumentary that presents a gory, funny, and obviously affectionate skewering of the slasher genre.
